location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: ‘Sketch map to illustrate approximate positions of districts in the vicinity of N.E. line from Lakmat As Shub.’

mods.abstract: Reproduction of a map showing districts north east of the village Lakmat as Shub [Lakmat al Ash‘ūb]. Each district is defined by a dotted line, with the district name written in capitals. Villages and towns are also marked on the map, as are notable topographic features, such as wadis, streams, and hills.
